accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection consists of two series: chronological files and Ford Foundation Program Review reports.
Original order was maintained during processing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection contains the office files of Ford Foundation staff member Chika A. Iritani. The files were created during the time that Iritani served in the foundation's Program Division.

The collection consists of two series. The first series contains a set of chronological files Iritani created to organize her correspondence. This series continues the run of Iritani's chronological files found in Series IV of the Ford Foundation records, Developing Countries Program, Program Staff Files (FA528 collection. Iritani was not placed in the Developing Countries Program when she created several of the files found in the collection. Letters from February 1990 show a shift in Iritani's position title from Program Division, Developing Countries Program to just Program Division. Therefore, it was decided during processing to keep the records as a separate collection.
The second series contains a group of Program Review reports for different Ford Foundation Developing Country Program's regional and country initiatives.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Chika A. Iritani supported the Ford Foundation's grants administration activities for many years while she worked in the foundation's Program Division.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to the RAC in 2018 by the Ford Foundation and was ingested by the RAC as Accession 2018:069.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series contains a set of chronological files Ford Foundation staff member Chika A. Iritani created to organize her correspondence. Most files primarily consist of correspondence addressed from Iritani to grantees and other Ford staff members. However, the 1987-1990 Chronological file (Box 2, Folders 8-10) also includes a significant amount of correspondence addressed to Iritani. Correspondence in that file includes many faxes and telegrams and originates from a more extensive period of time than what is covered by the other chronological files.

Correspondence in the series generally regards the receipt of grant reports, closeouts of grants, purchase orders, and program reviews among other grants administration and program management activities.
Series continues the run of Iritani chronological files started in Series IV of the Ford Foundation records, Developing Countries Program, Program Staff Files (FA528) collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Series contains a group of Ford Foundation Program Review reports published in May 1992. The reports analyze different Ford Foundation Developing Country Program's regional and country initiatives.
